title: Never tell me that dreams can't come true

replies.body:
DREAMS CAN COME TRUE!


JESUS TOOK THE WHEEL!
Yorick rework, Baker Pantheon, now all we need is Dragon Master Swain
Um hi Pizza Delivery {{champion:15}} would like to have a word with you

what about Surfer {{champion:39}}  ??

SUH DUDE LOOK AT THE WAVES OF THE RIFT
I'm just waiting for Taco Prophet Kled. He brought the knowledge of tacos to Rune-terra.{{champion:240}}

problem would be kitten style active animation where the blades expand...you cant do that with a surf board

simple, make an animation of her getting of the board to do it

im pretty sure there is gameplay of it as a custom skin you can see how they did it
How is this not a skin already

https://67.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_luw1wo3ZF91qj8bffo1_1280.jpg

Why isn't Sinful Succulence Morgana in the picture?  She started cooking long before it was cool.
